1: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>And the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>came unto me saying</n>
2: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Son</n> אָדָ֕ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> הִנָּבֵ֖א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>prophesy</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> רוֹעֵ֣י <sup>7462 </sup> <n>against the shepherds</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הִנָּבֵ֣א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>prophesy</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֨ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> לָרֹעִ֜ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>unto the shepherds</n> כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto them Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> ה֤וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>Woe</n> רֹעֵֽי־ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>[be] to the shepherds</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הָיוּ֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have been</n> רֹעִ֣ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>that do feed</n> אוֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> הֲל֣וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הַצֹּ֔אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>cattle</n> יִרְע֖וּ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>themselves should not the shepherds</n> הָרֹעִֽים׃ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>feed</n>
3: אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֵ֤לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>the fat</n> תֹּאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>Ye eat</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַצֶּ֣מֶר <sup>6785 </sup> <n>you with the wool</n> תִּלְבָּ֔שׁוּ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>and ye clothe</n> הַבְּרִיאָ֖ה <sup>1277 </sup> <n>them that are fed</n> תִּזְבָּ֑חוּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>ye kill</n> הַצֹּ֖אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>not the flock</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> תִרְעֽוּ׃ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>[but] ye feed</n>
4: אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנַּחְלוֹת֩ <sup>2470 </sup> <n>The diseased</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> חִזַּקְתֶּ֜ם <sup>2388 </sup> <n>have ye not strengthened</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחוֹלָ֣ה <sup>2470 </sup> <n>that which was sick</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> רִפֵּאתֶ֗ם <sup>7495 </sup> <n>neither have ye healed</n> וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֙רֶת֙ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>[that which was] broken</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> חֲבַשְׁתֶּ֔ם <sup>2280 </sup> <n>neither have ye bound up</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנִּדַּ֙חַת֙ <sup>5080 </sup> <n>that which was driven away</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> הֲשֵׁבֹתֶ֔ם <sup>7725 </sup> <n>neither have ye brought again</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֹבֶ֖דֶת <sup>6 </sup> <n>that which was lost</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> בִקַּשְׁתֶּ֑ם <sup>1245 </sup> <n>neither have ye sought</n> וּבְחָזְקָ֛ה <sup>2394 </sup> <n>but with force</n> רְדִיתֶ֥ם <sup>7287 </sup> <n>have ye ruled</n> אֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> וּבְפָֽרֶךְ׃ <sup>6531 </sup> <n>and with cruelty</n>
5: וַתְּפוּצֶ֖ינָה <sup>6327 </sup> <n>And they were scattered</n> מִבְּלִ֣י <sup>1097 </sup> <n>lack</n> רֹעֶ֑ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>because [there is] no shepherd</n> וַתִּהְיֶ֧ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> לְאָכְלָ֛ה <sup>402 </sup> <n>and they became meat</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> חַיַּ֥ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>to all the beasts</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> וַתְּפוּצֶֽינָה׃ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>when they were scattered</n>
6: יִשְׁגּ֤וּ <sup>7686 </sup> <n>wandered</n> צֹאנִי֙ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>My sheep</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>through all the mountains</n> וְעַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> גִּבְעָ֣ה <sup>1389 </sup> <n>hill</n> רָמָ֑ה <sup>7311 </sup> <n>and upon every high</n> וְעַ֨ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> פְּנֵ֤י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>upon all the face</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> נָפֹ֣צוּ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>was scattered</n> צֹאנִ֔י <sup>6629 </sup> <n>yea my flock</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> דּוֹרֵ֖שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>and none did search</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>was no</n> מְבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>or seek</n>
7: לָכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> רֹעִ֔ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>Therefore ye shepherds</n> שִׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּבַ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
8: חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>[As] I live</n> אָ֜נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יַ֣עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>because</n> הֱיֽוֹת־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> צֹאנִ֣י ׀ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>surely because my flock</n> לָבַ֡ז <sup>957 </sup> <n>became a prey</n> וַתִּֽהְיֶינָה֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> צֹאנִ֨י <sup>6629 </sup> <n>and my flock</n> לְאָכְלָ֜ה <sup>402 </sup> <n>became meat</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> חַיַּ֤ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>to every beast</n> הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> מֵאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>lack</n> רֹעֶ֔ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>because [there was] no shepherd</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> דָרְשׁ֥וּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>search</n> רֹעַ֖י <sup>7462 </sup> <n>neither did my shepherds</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צֹאנִ֑י <sup>6629 </sup> <n>for my flock</n> וַיִּרְע֤וּ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>but the shepherds</n> הָֽרֹעִים֙ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>fed</n> אוֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צֹאנִ֖י <sup>6629 </sup> <n>not my flock</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> רָעֽוּ׃ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>themselves and fed</n> ס
9: לָכֵן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> הָֽרֹעִ֔ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>Therefore O ye shepherds</n> שִׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hear</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
10: כֹּה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֞ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>I am against</n> הָרֹעִ֜ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>Behold I [am] against the shepherds</n> וְֽדָרַשְׁתִּ֧י <sup>1875 </sup> <n>and I will require</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צֹאנִ֣י <sup>6629 </sup> <n>my flock</n> מִיָּדָ֗ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at their hand</n> וְהִשְׁבַּתִּים֙ <sup>7673 </sup> <n>and cause them to cease</n> מֵרְע֣וֹת <sup>7462 </sup> <n>from feeding</n> צֹ֔אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>the flock</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִרְע֥וּ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>neither shall the shepherds</n> ע֛וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>anymore</n> הָרֹעִ֖ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>feed</n> אוֹתָ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <sup>5337 </sup> <n>themselves any more for I will deliver</n> צֹאנִי֙ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>my flock</n> מִפִּיהֶ֔ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>from their mouth</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִהְיֶ֥יןָ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָהֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <sup>402 </sup> <n>that they may not be meat</n> ס
11: כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>For thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הִנְנִי־ <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> אָ֕נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>Myself</n> וְדָרַשְׁתִּ֥י <sup>1875 </sup> <n>Behold I [even] I will both search</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צֹאנִ֖י <sup>6629 </sup> <n>my sheep</n> וּבִקַּרְתִּֽים׃ <sup>1239 </sup> <n>and seek them out</n>
12: כְּבַקָּרַת֩ <sup>1243 </sup> <n>seeketh out</n> רֹעֶ֨ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>As a shepherd</n> עֶדְר֜וֹ <sup>5739 </sup> <n>his flock</n> בְּיוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> הֱיוֹת֤וֹ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְתוֹךְ־ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>that he is among</n> צֹאנוֹ֙ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>his sheep</n> נִפְרָשׁ֔וֹת <sup>6567 </sup> <n>[that are] scattered</n> כֵּ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> אֲבַקֵּ֣ר <sup>1239 </sup> <n>so will I seek out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צֹאנִ֑י <sup>6629 </sup> <n>my sheep</n> וְהִצַּלְתִּ֣י <sup>5337 </sup> <n>and will deliver</n> אֶתְהֶ֗ם <sup>853 </sup> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַמְּקוֹמֹת֙ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>them out of all places</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to which</n> נָפֹ֣צוּ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>where they have been scattered</n> שָׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> עָנָ֖ן <sup>6051 </sup> <n>in the cloudy</n> וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <sup>6205 </sup> <n>and dark</n>
13: וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣ים <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And I will bring them out</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָעַמִּ֗ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>from the people</n> וְקִבַּצְתִּים֙ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and gather</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <sup>776 </sup> <n>them from the countries</n> וַהֲבִיאֹתִ֖ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>and will bring</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַדְמָתָ֑ם <sup>127 </sup> <n>them to their own land</n> וּרְעִיתִים֙ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>and feed</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> הָרֵ֣י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>them upon the mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> בָּאֲפִיקִ֕ים <sup>650 </sup> <n>by the rivers</n> וּבְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <sup>4186 </sup> <n>and in all the inhabited places</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the country</n>
14: בְּמִרְעֶה־ <sup>4829 </sup> <n>pasture</n> טּוֹב֙ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>them in a good</n> אֶרְעֶ֣ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>I will feed</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וּבְהָרֵ֥י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mountains</n> מְרֽוֹם־ <sup>4791 </sup> <n>and upon the high</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נְוֵהֶ֑ם <sup>5116 </sup> <n>shall their fold</n> שָׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> תִּרְבַּ֙צְנָה֙ <sup>7257 </sup> <n>be there shall they lie</n> בְּנָ֣וֶה <sup>5116 </sup> <n>fold</n> טּ֔וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>in a good</n> וּמִרְעֶ֥ה <sup>4829 </sup> <n>pasture</n> שָׁמֵ֛ן <sup>8082 </sup> <n>and [in] a fat</n> תִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>shall they feed</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> הָרֵ֥י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>upon the mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
15: אֲנִ֨י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶרְעֶ֤ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>I will feed</n> צֹאנִי֙ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>my flock</n> וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>and I</n> אַרְבִּיצֵ֔ם <sup>7257 </sup> <n>and I will cause them to lie down</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n>
16: אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֹבֶ֤דֶת <sup>6 </sup> <n>that which was lost</n> אֲבַקֵּשׁ֙ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>I will seek</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנִּדַּ֣חַת <sup>5080 </sup> <n>that which was driven away</n> אָשִׁ֔יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and bring again</n> וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֣רֶת <sup>7665 </sup> <n>[that which was] broken</n> אֶחֱבֹ֔שׁ <sup>2280 </sup> <n>and will bind up</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחוֹלָ֖ה <sup>2470 </sup> <n>that which was sick</n> אֲחַזֵּ֑ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and will strengthen</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשְּׁמֵנָ֧ה <sup>8082 </sup> <n>the fat</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֲזָקָ֛ה <sup>2389 </sup> <n>and the strong</n> אַשְׁמִ֖יד <sup>8045 </sup> <n>but I will destroy</n> אֶרְעֶ֥נָּה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>I will feed</n> בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>them with judgment</n>
